pricingPolicyModule.text: We strive to provide you with the lowest prices possible on Walmart.com as well as in our stores. However, sometimes a price online does not match the price in a store. Walmart.com's prices may be either higher or lower than local store prices. Prices may also vary between stores. Our local stores do not honor Walmart.com pricing or competitor advertisements from outside of a store's local trade territory.

productInformationModule.HTML_SHELF:
• 14 megapixel resolution
  • 5X Schneider-Kreuznach optical zoom lens
  • 3.0" indoor/outdoor color display
productInformationModule.shortDescription: Picture this - you're letting loose at a trendy hot spot with friends, snapping pictures so amazing you'll want to share them online as soon as you get home. Any other camera would slow you down with tags, sorts and uploads - but not this red Kodak 14MP digital camera. Kodak's Share button allows you to tag pictures directly from your camera for emailing or uploading to YouTube, Facebook, Flickr and the Kodak Gallery. The real Kodak moment happens when you share. This bundle includes a 4GB memory card and camera bag.
productInformationModule.HTML:
Picture this - you're letting loose at a trendy hot spot with friends, snapping pictures so amazing you'll want to share them online as soon as you get home. Any other camera would slow you down with tags, sorts and uploads - but not this red Kodak 14MP digital camera. Kodak's Share button allows you to tag pictures directly from your camera for emailing or uploading to YouTube, Facebook, Flickr and the Kodak Gallery. The real Kodak moment happens when you share. This bundle includes a 4GB memory card and camera bag.

Red Kodak 14MP Digital Camera, Easyshare M575:

  • 14 megapixel resolution
    More megapixels
  • 5x Schneider-Kreuznach optical zoom lens
    Zoom in close for extraordinary details in faraway shots, or capture dramatic shots in tight quarters with the 28mm wide-angle lens
  • 3.0" indoor/outdoor color display
    Preview and share your pictures with this large, bright, vivid color screen
  • Share button
    With Kodak's one-button upload, sharing your pictures is amazingly simple
  • Image stabilization
    Reduces blur caused by subject movement or fast-action situations for clearer, sharper pictures
  • Smart Capture
    Automatically identifies the scene you're shooting and adjusts camera settings for a great picture
  • Face Recognition
    Recognizes up to 20 pre-tagged faces so you can easily locate them later; recognizes up to five faces in a single image
  • Kodak EasyShare software
    The complete solution for transferring, online sharing, emailing, organizing, editing and printing your pictures
  • Lithium-ion rechargeable battery
    Get energy that lasts with a smaller, lighter battery with higher voltage and energy capacity
  • HD picture capture
    Take stunning HD pictures and view in high-definition on an HDTV or other HD devices
  • HD video capture
    Capture HD quality video with sound and on-camera editing
  • High ISO mode
    See the details in low-light conditions and fast-action situations with ISO up to 3200
  • On-camera picture enhancing features
    Manually select from multiple scene and color modes; create your perfect shot with cropping, auto picture rotation and undo-delete
  • Panorama stitch mode
    Combines up to three shots into one large picture
  • Multimedia slideshow
    Turn your pictures into a creative slideshow right on the red Kodak 14MP digital camera; choose from pre-loaded sound themes and creative transitions
  • Internal memory plus
    Don't miss a shot if your memory card is full; switch to 32MB internal memory
  • SD/SDHC card compatibility
    Save your photos and videos to SD/SDHC digital media cards
  • Red Kodak 14MP digital camera includes rechargeable lithium-ion battery, USB AC adapter for in-camera charging, wrist strap, USB cable, user guide, 4GB memory card and camera bag
productInformationModule.description:
Picture this - you're letting loose at a trendy hot spot with friends, snapping pictures so amazing you'll want to share them online as soon as you get home. Any other camera would slow you down with tags, sorts and uploads - but not this red Kodak 14MP digital camera. Kodak's Share button allows you to tag pictures directly from your camera for emailing or uploading to YouTube, Facebook, Flickr and the Kodak Gallery. The real Kodak moment happens when you share. This bundle includes a 4GB memory card and camera bag.

preorderPriceGuaranteeModule: For items featured in our program, we guarantee our lowest price on the release date. Visit our Movies Coming Soon and Music Future Releases pages to save on featured hot titles today!
